abstract: Italy: press says new gas-propelled plane is ready
snippet: ROME, Dec. 1 (AP)--Italy's air force either has adopted or is ready to introduce a new type of plane, the Italian press indicated today, and the Turin newspaper Gazetta de Popolo said it would "bring a revolution" in air fighting....

headline.main: GAS-PROPELLED PLANE CLAIMED BY ITALIANS; Press Says Mystery Craft Will Revolutionize Air Warfare

lead_paragraph: ROME, Dec. 1 (AP)--Italy's air force either has adopted or is ready to introduce a new type of plane, the Italian press indicated today, and the Turin newspaper Gazetta de Popolo said it would "bring a revolution" in air fighting.
